How do you form the continuous tense in Nepali?
practice.explanation: म पढ्दैछु (I am reading) - दै shows ongoing action

practice.question: What is 'I will go' in Nepali?
Which is the polite imperative form of 'sit'?
practice.explanation: नुहोस् is the polite command form - यहाँ बस्नुहोस् (Please sit here)

practice.question: What does 'म किताब पढ्दैछु' mean?
practice.explanation: पढ्दैछु is continuous tense - action happening now

practice.question: Which ending shows future tense for 'he/she'?
practice.explanation: ऊ जानेछ (He/She will go) - नेछ for third person singular
